fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Target a player; set up a bombing site.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Artillery Battery**
*Unlock Condition:* Kill two+ people in a singular night
- You may now have infinite bombing sites setup.
- Upon having at least 3 bombing sites set up, you now roleblock whoever has a bombing sight setup on there house.
**Shattering Shells**
*Unlock Condition:* Have somebody survive your attack.
- Your attack now strips away defense.
- You will now attack astral visitors.
- Upon killing at least one person with powerful defense or above, you may have 3 bombing sites setup.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Whoever visits a bombing site gets attacked.
- Bombing sights take 1 night to setup
- You may never have more than 2 bombing sites.
- You only visit on the night you setup a bombing site.
